title: Authors and Citation
text: Wright D (2025). gwaspr: GWAS plotting R. R package version 1.0, https://derekmichaelwright.github.io/gwaspr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gwaspr: GWAS plotting in R},   author = {Derek Wright},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.0},   url = {https://derekmichaelwright.github.io/gwaspr/}, }

title: GWAS plotting in R
text: gwaspr: R package plotting GWAS results GAPIT package

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: devtools::install_github("derekmichaelwright/gwaspr") library(gwaspr)

title: GWAS plotting in R
text: best practice, output GAPIT folder. case, located folder called GWAS_Results/. example plot GWAS results 3 traits lentil diversity panel: ****Cotyledon_Color**: qualitative trait describing cotyledon color (Red = 0, Yellow = 1). DTF_Nepal_2017: quantitative trait describing days sowing flowering 2017 Nepal field trial. DTF_Sask_2017: quantitative trait describing days sowing flowering 2017 Saskatchewan field trial. DTF_Sask_2017_b: run b coefficient photothermal model (see Wright et al. 2020) used covariate. Note: info check GWAS tutorial.

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: myTraits <- list_Traits(folder = "GWAS_Results/") myTraits ## [1] "Cotyledon_Color" "DTF_Nepal_2017"  "DTF_Sask_2017"   "DTF_Sask_2017_b"

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: myFiles <- list_Result_Files(folder = "GWAS_Results/") myFiles ##  [1] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.BLINK.Cotyledon_Color.csv"   ##  [2] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.BLINK.DTF_Nepal_2017.csv"    ##  [3] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.BLINK.DTF_Sask_2017.csv"     ##  [4] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.BLINK.DTF_Sask_2017_b.csv"   ##  [5] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.CMLM.Cotyledon_Color.csv"    ##  [6] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.CMLM.DTF_Nepal_2017.csv"     ##  [7] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.CMLM.DTF_Sask_2017.csv"      ##  [8] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.CMLM.DTF_Sask_2017_b.csv"    ##  [9] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.FarmCPU.Cotyledon_Color.csv" ## [10] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.FarmCPU.DTF_Nepal_2017.csv"  ## [11] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.FarmCPU.DTF_Sask_2017.csv"   ## [12] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.FarmCPU.DTF_Sask_2017_b.csv" ## [13] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.GLM.Cotyledon_Color.csv"     ## [14] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.GLM.DTF_Nepal_2017.csv"      ## [15] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.GLM.DTF_Sask_2017.csv"       ## [16] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.GLM.DTF_Sask_2017_b.csv"     ## [17] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLM.Cotyledon_Color.csv"     ## [18] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLM.DTF_Nepal_2017.csv"      ## [19] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLM.DTF_Sask_2017.csv"       ## [20] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLM.DTF_Sask_2017_b.csv"     ## [21] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLMM.Cotyledon_Color.csv"    ## [22] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLMM.DTF_Nepal_2017.csv"     ## [23] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLMM.DTF_Sask_2017.csv"      ## [24] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.MLMM.DTF_Sask_2017_b.csv"    ## [25] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.SUPER.Cotyledon_Color.csv"   ## [26] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.SUPER.DTF_Nepal_2017.csv"    ## [27] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.SUPER.DTF_Sask_2017.csv"     ## [28] "GAPIT.Association.GWAS_Results.SUPER.DTF_Sask_2017_b.csv"

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: is_ran(folder = "GWAS_Results/") ##             Trait MLM MLMM FarmCPU BLINK GLM CMLM SUPER ## 1 Cotyledon_Color   X    X       X     X   X    X     X ## 2  DTF_Nepal_2017   X    X       X     X   X    X     X ## 3   DTF_Sask_2017   X    X       X     X   X    X     X ## 4 DTF_Sask_2017_b   X    X       X     X   X    X     X

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: # first reorder the result files if they are not already arranged by P.value order_GWAS_Results(folder = "GWAS_Results/", files = myFiles) is_ordered(folder = "GWAS_Results/") ##             Trait MLM MLMM FarmCPU BLINK GLM CMLM SUPER ## 1 Cotyledon_Color   X    X       X     X   X    X     X ## 2  DTF_Nepal_2017   X    X       X     X   X    X     X ## 3   DTF_Sask_2017   X    X       X     X   X    X     X ## 4 DTF_Sask_2017_b   X    X       X     X   X    X     X myResults <- table_GWAS_Results(folder = "GWAS_Results/", files = myFiles,                                 threshold = 6.8, sug.threshold = 5) myResults[1:10,] ##                        SNP Chr       Pos       P.value        MAF   H.B.P.Value ## 1  Lcu.1GRN.Chr1p365986872   1 365986872 7.591040e-158 0.47096774 2.553375e-152 ## 2  Lcu.1GRN.Chr1p365986872   1 365986872 1.420895e-132 0.47096774 4.779422e-127 ## 3  Lcu.1GRN.Chr1p365986872   1 365986872 1.526374e-101 0.47096774  5.134218e-96 ## 4  Lcu.1GRN.Chr1p361840399   1 361840399  4.903122e-56 0.04193548  8.246243e-51 ## 5  Lcu.1GRN.Chr4p416272481   4 416272481  7.979537e-42 0.27795031  2.684053e-36 ## 6  Lcu.1GRN.Chr4p416272481   4 416272481  7.979537e-42 0.27795031  2.684053e-36 ## 7  Lcu.1GRN.Chr4p416272481   4 416272481  7.979537e-42 0.27795031  2.684053e-36 ## 8  Lcu.1GRN.Chr4p415952453   4 415952453  4.361101e-41 0.27484472  6.838708e-36 ## 9  Lcu.1GRN.Chr4p415952453   4 415952453  4.361101e-41 0.27484472  6.838708e-36 ## 10 Lcu.1GRN.Chr4p415952453   4 415952453  4.361101e-41 0.27484472  6.838708e-36 ##        Effect -log10(p)   Model           Trait   Threshold ## 1   0.5033628 157.11970    MLMM Cotyledon_Color Significant ## 2   0.4885724 131.84744 FarmCPU Cotyledon_Color Significant ## 3   0.4137794 100.81634   BLINK Cotyledon_Color Significant ## 4   0.4990497  55.30953 FarmCPU Cotyledon_Color Significant ## 5  -2.9355992  41.09802    CMLM DTF_Sask_2017_b Significant ## 6  -2.9355992  41.09802     GLM DTF_Sask_2017_b Significant ## 7  -2.9355992  41.09802   SUPER DTF_Sask_2017_b Significant ## 8  -2.8859922  40.36040    CMLM DTF_Sask_2017_b Significant ## 9  -2.8859922  40.36040     GLM DTF_Sask_2017_b Significant ## 10 -2.8859922  40.36040   SUPER DTF_Sask_2017_b Significant list_Top_Markers(folder = "GWAS_Results/", trait = "DTF_Nepal_2017",                   threshold = 6.7, chroms = c(2,5)) ## # A tibble: 8 × 6 ##   SNP                      Chr      Pos Traits         Models           Max_LogP ##   <chr>                  <int>    <int> <chr>          <chr>               <dbl> ## 1 Lcu.1GRN.Chr2p44545877     2 44545877 DTF_Nepal_2017 BLINK; CMLM; Fa…    40.1  ## 2 Lcu.1GRN.Chr2p44546658     2 44546658 DTF_Nepal_2017 CMLM; GLM; MLM;…    39.8  ## 3 Lcu.1GRN.Chr2p44558948     2 44558948 DTF_Nepal_2017 CMLM; GLM; MLM;…    39.5  ## 4 Lcu.1GRN.Chr5p1658484      5  1658484 DTF_Nepal_2017 BLINK; CMLM; Fa…    31.7  ## 5 Lcu.1GRN.Chr5p73165919     5 73165919 DTF_Nepal_2017 CMLM; GLM; SUPER    26.6  ## 6 Lcu.1GRN.Chr5p73166268     5 73166268 DTF_Nepal_2017 CMLM; GLM; SUPER    26.6  ## 7 Lcu.1GRN.Chr5p1650591      5  1650591 DTF_Nepal_2017 MLM                  8.30 ## 8 Lcu.1GRN.Chr5p1651791      5  1651791 DTF_Nepal_2017 MLM                  8.30 list_Top_Markers(folder = "GWAS_Results/", trait = "DTF_Sask_2017_b",                   threshold = 6.7, chroms = 6) ## # A tibble: 8 × 6 ##   SNP                       Chr       Pos Traits          Models        Max_LogP ##   <chr>                   <int>     <int> <chr>           <chr>            <dbl> ## 1 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p22044874      6  22044874 DTF_Sask_2017_b CMLM; GLM; S…    36.6  ## 2 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p21968500      6  21968500 DTF_Sask_2017_b CMLM; GLM; S…    35.7  ## 3 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p22039846      6  22039846 DTF_Sask_2017_b CMLM; GLM; S…    35.6  ## 4 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p3269280       6   3269280 DTF_Sask_2017_b BLINK; FarmC…    32.9  ## 5 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p324049462     6 324049462 DTF_Sask_2017_b BLINK            13.1  ## 6 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p46982948      6  46982948 DTF_Sask_2017_b BLINK             9.10 ## 7 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p431595092     6 431595092 DTF_Sask_2017_b FarmCPU           9.04 ## 8 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p172232372     6 172232372 DTF_Sask_2017_b FarmCPU           8.71 list_Top_Markers(folder = "GWAS_Results/", trait = "Cotyledon_Color",                   threshold = 6.7, chroms = 6, n = 2) ## # A tibble: 2 × 6 ##   SNP                       Chr       Pos Traits          Models        Max_LogP ##   <chr>                   <int>     <int> <chr>           <chr>            <dbl> ## 1 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p390278241     6 390278241 Cotyledon_Color CMLM; GLM; S…     23.0 ## 2 Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p390159188     6 390159188 Cotyledon_Color CMLM; GLM; S…     20.0 myMarkers <- c("Lcu.1GRN.Chr2p44545877", "Lcu.1GRN.Chr5p1658484",                "Lcu.1GRN.Chr6p3269280", "Lcu.1GRN.Chr1p365986872")

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: for(i in myTraits) {   mp <- gg_Manhattan(folder = "GWAS_Results/",                       trait = i,                       title = paste("LDP -", i),                       threshold = 6.7,                       sug.threshold = 5,                       vlines = myMarkers,                      vline.colors = c("red","red","darkgreen","blue"),                      vline.types = c(1,1,1,1),                      vline.legend = T,                      facet = F,                      addQQ = T,                      pmax = 12,                       models = c("MLM", "MLMM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK"),                      model.colors = c("darkgreen", "darkred", "darkorange3", "steelblue"),                      legend.rows = 2)   ggsave(paste0("man/figures/Multi_", i, ".png"),           mp, width = 12, height = 4, bg = "white") }

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: for(i in myTraits) {   mp <- gg_Manhattan(folder = "GWAS_Results/",                       trait = i,                       title = paste("LDP -", i),                       threshold = 7.3,                       sug.threshold = 6.7,                       vlines = myMarkers,                      vline.colors = c("red","red","darkgreen","blue"),                      vline.types = c(1,1,1,1),                      vline.legend = T,                      facet = T,                      addQQ = T,                      pmax = 12,                       models = c("MLM", "MLMM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK"),                      chrom.colors = rep(c("darkgreen", "darkgoldenrod2"), 4),                      legend.rows = 1)   ggsave(paste0("man/figures/Facet_", i, ".png"),           mp, width = 12, height = 8, bg = "white") }

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: mp <- gg_GWAS_Summary(folder = "GWAS_Results/",                        traits = myTraits,                       models = c("MLM", "MLMM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK"),                       colors = c("darkgreen", "darkred", "darkorange3", "steelblue"),                       threshold = 6.7, sug.threshold = 6,                        hlines = c(1.5,3.5), legend.rows = 2,                       vlines = myMarkers,                       vline.colors = c("red", "red", "green", "blue"),                       vline.types = c(1,1,1,1),                       title = "Summary of Significant GWAS Results") ggsave("man/figures/GWAS_Summary_01.png", mp, width = 12, height = 4) mp <- gg_GWAS_Summary(folder = "GWAS_Results/",                        traits = myTraits,                       models = c("MLMM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK"),                       colors = c("darkred", "darkorange3", "steelblue"),                       threshold = 6.7, sug.threshold = 6,                        hlines = c(1.5,3.5), legend.rows = 2,                       vlines = myMarkers,                       vline.colors = c("red", "red", "green", "blue"),                       vline.types = c(1,1,1,1),                       title = "Summary of Significant GWAS Results") ggsave("man/figures/GWAS_Summary_02.png", mp, width = 12, height = 4)

title: GWAS plotting in R
code: # Prep  myG <- read.csv("myG_hmp.csv", header = T) # Plot mp <- gg_GWAS_Hits(xx = myResults,                     xG = myG,                     xCV = NULL,                    traits = list_Traits("GWAS_Results/"),                     range = 2000000,                     title = "",                    sigMin = 0,                     models =  c("MLM", "MLMM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK"),                    model.colors = c("darkgreen", "darkred", "darkorange3", "steelblue"),                    model.shapes = 21:24,                    vlines = myMarkers,                    vline.colors = c("red", "red", "green", "blue"),                    vline.types = rep(1, length(vlines)),                    legend.rows = 2) ggsave("man/figures/GWAS_Hits_01.png", mp, width = 10, height = 4) # Plot mp <- gg_GWAS_Hits(xx = myResults,                     xG = myG,                     xCV = NULL,                    traits = c("DTF_Nepal_2017", "DTF_Sask_2017", "DTF_Sask_2017_b"),                     range = 2000000,                     title = "",                    sigMin = 0,                     models =  c("MLM", "MLMM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK"),                    model.colors = c("darkgreen", "darkred", "darkorange3", "steelblue"),                    model.shapes = 21:24,                    vlines = myMarkers,                    vline.colors = c("red", "red", "green", "blue"),                    vline.types = rep(1, length(vlines)),                    legend.rows = 2) ggsave("man/figures/GWAS_Hits_02.png", mp, width = 10, height = 4)

title: GWAS plotting in R
text: GAPIT: R package performing Genome Wide Association Studies (GWAS) https://github.com/jiabowang/GAPIT

title: GWAS plotting in R
text: tidyverse, ggpubr, ggbeeswarm, ggrepel, ggtext, plotly, htmlwidgets © Derek Michael Wright

title: dropNAcol — dropNAcol
code: dropNAcol(x)

title: gg_GWAS_Hits — gg_GWAS_Hits
text: Creates summary GWAS plot significant associations.

title: gg_GWAS_Hits — gg_GWAS_Hits
code: gg_GWAS_Hits(   xx,   xG,   xCV = NULL,   traits,   range = 2e+06,   title = "",   sigMin = 0,   models = c("MLM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK", "MLMM", "GLM", "CMLM", "SUPER"),   model.colors = c("darkgreen", "darkorange3", "steelblue", "darkred", "darkorchid4",     "burlywood4", "darkseagreen4"),   model.shapes = c(21:25, 21:22),   vlines = NULL,   vline.colors = rep("red", length(vlines)),   vline.types = rep(1, length(vlines)),   legend.rows = 1 )

title: gg_GWAS_Hits — gg_GWAS_Hits
text: xx Table significant GWAS results. See ?table_GWAS_Results(). xG Genotype data hapmap format. xCV Optional, filtering "CV" column. traits List traits use. range Range binning GWAS hits. title Title horizontal facet. sigMin Minimum number hits plot. models Models read. model.colors Colors model. vlines Markers labelled vertical red line. vline.colors colors vertical line. vline.types lty vertical line. legend.rows Number rows legend.

title: gg_GWAS_Summary — gg_GWAS_Summary
text: Creates summary GWAS plot significant associations.

title: gg_GWAS_Summary — gg_GWAS_Summary
code: gg_GWAS_Summary(   folder = "GWAS_Results/",   traits = list_Traits(folder),   threshold = -log10(5e-08),   sug.threshold = -log10(5e-06),   chroms = NULL,   pos1 = NULL,   pos2 = NULL,   models = c("MLM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK", "MLMM", "GLM", "CMLM", "SUPER"),   colors = c("darkgreen", "darkorange3", "steelblue", "darkred", "darkorchid4",     "burlywood4", "darkseagreen4"),   shapes = 21:25,   hlines = NULL,   vlines = NULL,   vline.colors = rep("red", length(vlines)),   vline.types = rep(1, length(vlines)),   vline.legend = T,   title = NULL,   caption = paste0("Sig Threshold = ", threshold, " = Large\nSuggestive = ",     sug.threshold, " = Small"),   rowread = 2000,   legend.position = "bottom",   legend.rows = 1,   plotHBPvalues = F )

title: gg_GWAS_Summary — gg_GWAS_Summary
text: folder Folder containing GWAS results. traits traits read. threshold Significant threshold. sug.threshold Suggestive threshold. chroms Chromosomes plot. pos1 starting position plot. pos2 ending position plot. models Models read. colors Colors model. shapes shape values use different models. e.g., 21:25 hlines Locations horizontal lines. e.g., hlines = c(1.5,2.5). vlines Markers labelled vertical red line. vline.colors colors vertical line. vline.types lty vertical line. vline.legend Logical, display vline color legend. title title plot. caption caption plot. rowread Number rows read GWAS results file. legend.rows Number rows legend. plotHBPvalues Logical, H.B.P.Values uses.

title: gg_GWAS_plotly — gg_GWAS_plotly
code: gg_GWAS_plotly(mp, filename = "GWAS_plotly.html")

title: gg_GWAS_plotly — gg_GWAS_plotly
text: mp ggplot object. filename Filename plot.

title: gg_Manhattan — gg_Manhattan
code: gg_Manhattan(   folder = "GWAS_Results/",   trait = list_Traits(folder)[1],   title = trait,   threshold = NULL,   sug.threshold = NULL,   chrom = NULL,   vlines = markers,   vline.colors = rep("red", length(vlines)),   vline.types = rep(1, length(vlines)),   vline.legend = T,   markers = NULL,   labels = markers,   facet = F,   addQQ = T,   pmax = NULL,   models = c("MLM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK", "MLMM", "GLM", "CMLM", "SUPER"),   model.colors = c("darkgreen", "darkorange3", "steelblue", "darkred", "darkorchid4",     "burlywood4", "darkseagreen4"),   highlight.sig = F,   sig.col = "darkred",   chrom.colors = rep(c("darkgreen", "darkgoldenrod3"), 30),   chrom.unit = "100 Mbp",   legend.rows = 1,   plotHBPvalues = F )

title: gg_Manhattan — gg_Manhattan
text: folder Folder containing GWAS results. trait trait read. title title plot. threshold Significant Threshold. sug.threshold Suggested threshold. chrom Chromosomes plot. Use want plot single chromosome. vlines Markers used location vertical lines. vline.colors colors vertical line. vline.types lty vertical line. vline.legend Logical, whether add legend vlines. markers Markers labelled. labels Labels used markers. facet Logical, whether produce facetted multi-model plot. Default `facet = F` addQQ Logical, whether add QQ plot pmax max value y-axis. models Models read. model.colors Colors model. Used `facet = F`. highlight.sig Logical, whether highlight significant associations black circle. Used `facet = F`. sig.col Color significant assoctiations. Used `facet = T`. chrom.colors Colors chromosome. Used `facet = T`. chrom.unit Unit x-axis. Can one c("kbp","100 kbp","Mbp","100 Mbp","Gbp"). legend.rows Number rows legend. plotHBPvalues Logical, H.B.P.Values uses. pos1 starting position plot. pos2 ending position plot.

title: gg_Manhattan_Traits — gg_Manhattan_Traits
code: gg_Manhattan_Traits(   folder = "GWAS_Results/",   traits = list_Traits(folder)[1:2],   title = trait,   threshold = NULL,   sug.threshold = NULL,   vlines = markers,   vline.colors = rep("red", length(vlines)),   vline.types = rep(1, length(vlines)),   vline.legend = F,   markers = NULL,   labels = markers,   facet = F,   addQQ = T,   pmax = NULL,   model = "MLM",   trait.colors = c("darkgreen", "darkorange3", "steelblue", "darkred", "darkorchid4",     "burlywood4", "darkseagreen4"),   chrom.unit = "100 Mbp",   legend.rows = 1 )

title: gg_Manhattan_Traits — gg_Manhattan_Traits
text: folder Folder containing GWAS results. traits traits read. title title plot. threshold Significant Threshold. sug.threshold Suggested threshold. vlines Markers used location vertical lines. vline.colors colors vertical line. vline.types lty vertical line. vline.legend Logical, whether add legend vlines. markers Markers labelled. labels Labels used markers. facet Logical, whether produce facetted multi-model plot. addQQ Logical, whether add QQ plot pmax max value y-axis. model Model read. trait.colors Colors trait. chrom.unit Unit x-axis. Can one c("kbp","100 kbp","Mbp","100 Mbp","Gbp"). legend.rows Number rows legend.

title: gg_Manhattan_Zoom — gg_Manhattan_Zoom
text: Creates manhattan plot zoomed particular region.

title: gg_Manhattan_Zoom — gg_Manhattan_Zoom
code: gg_Manhattan_Zoom(   folder = "GWAS_Results/",   trait = list_Traits(folder)[1],   chrom,   pos1,   pos2,   title = trait,   threshold = NULL,   sug.threshold = NULL,   markers = NULL,   labels = markers,   vlines = markers,   vline.colors = "red",   sig.col = "red",   models = c("MLM", "FarmCPU", "BLINK", "MLMM", "GLM", "CMLM", "SUPER"),   model.colors = c("darkgreen", "darkorange3", "steelblue", "darkred", "darkorchid4",     "burlywood4", "darkseagreen4"),   facet = F,   highlight.sig = F,   highlight.marker.color = "red",   legend.rows = 1,   plotHBPvalues = F )

title: gg_Manhattan_Zoom — gg_Manhattan_Zoom
text: folder Folder containing GWAS results. trait trait read. chrom Chromosome plot. pos1 Start position chromosome. pos2 End position chromosome. title title plot. threshold Significant Threshold. sug.threshold Suggested threshold. markers Markers labelled. labels Labels used markers. vlines Markers used location vertical lines. vline.colors colors vertical line. sig.col Color significant assoctiations. models Models read. facet Logical, whether produce facetted multi-model plot. Default `facet = F`. highlight.sig Logical, whether highlight significant associations black circle. Used `facet = F`. legend.rows Number rows legend. plotHBPvalues Logical, H.B.P.Values uses.

title: gg_Marker — gg_Marker_Bar

title: gg_Marker — gg_Marker_Bar
text: xG GWAS genotype object. Note:  needs hapmap format. xY GWAS phenotype object. trait Trait plot. markers Markers plot. marker.colors Color palette.

title: gg_Marker — gg_Marker_Box
text: xG GWAS genotype object. Note: needs hapmap format. xY GWAS phenotype object. trait Trait plot. markers Markers plot. box.width width boxplot. points Logical, whether plot points. violin Logical, whether plot violin. marker.colors Color palette.

title: gg_Volcano — gg_Volcano
text: folder Folder containing GWAS results. trait trait read. title title plot. markers Markers labelled. labels Labels used markers. models Models read.

title: gg_myG_Details — gg_myG_Details
text: Analyses genotype data outputs 2 summary files marker details 3 plots.

title: gg_myG_Details — gg_myG_Details
code: gg_myG_Details(xx, myPrefix = "")

title: gg_myG_Details — gg_myG_Details
text: xx GWAS genotype object. Note: needs hapmap format. myPrefix Prefix file names.

title: list_Top_Markers — list_Top_Markers
text: folder Folder containing GWAS results. traits GWAS trait. models GWAS models include. threshold filters results -log10(p) threshold. chroms Chromosomes include. n Number per trait model.

title: table_GWAS_Results — table_GWAS_Results

title: table_GWAS_Results — table_GWAS_Results
text: folder Folder containing GWAS results. files files read. nrowstoread Number rows read. threshold Significant threshold. sug.threshold Suggestive threshold. useHBPvalues Logical, H.B.P.Values uses.
